p: NGS has been used in diagnostic virology for several applications. Recently, Kustin et al. [ 126] used NGS for rapid and robust identification of respiratory viruses in clinical samples. It was applied to track influenza A (H1N1) pdm09 virus [ 127]. Dessilly et al. [ 128] used NGS for the detection of HIV-1 drug resistance mutations. NGS was also conducted to discover a new Ebola virus [ 129].
